questions.question: A project manager is initiating a new software implementation project. Management has provided the budget and timeline constraints, but the specific deliverables are still undefined. Which document should the project manager develop FIRST?
options: Work breakdown structure
Project charter
Risk management plan
Communications management plan

questions.question: A project manager discovers that a key stakeholder's requirements were not captured during the initial planning phase. The project is now in the execution phase. What is the BEST course of action?
options: Ignore the requirements since they were not specified earlier
Include the requirements without analyzing their impact
Document the requirements and perform impact analysis through change control
Ask the stakeholder to wait until the next project phase

questions.question: A project manager has been informed that the project deadline must be moved up by one month. Which of the following approaches would be MOST appropriate to address this constraint?
options: Reduce the project scope through proper change control procedures
Ask team members to work overtime without additional compensation
Reduce the quality standards for deliverables
Ignore the request and maintain the original schedule

questions.question: Jim Tyler from PowerShellEngineer.com has been hired as a consultant to help automate deployment tasks in an upcoming IT infrastructure project. The project manager needs to formally define Jim's responsibilities in the project. Which document should include this information?
options: Project charter
RACI matrix
Risk register
Requirements traceability matrix

questions.question: A project team is struggling to estimate the time needed for a complex technical task that has never been done before. Which estimation technique would be MOST appropriate?
options: Parametric estimating
Three-point estimating
Bottom-up estimating
Analogous estimating

questions.question: During the execution of a software development project, a team member reports that a critical dependency will be delayed by two weeks. The project manager determines this will impact the project's critical path. What should the project manager do FIRST?
options: Crash the schedule by adding more resources
Update the risk register and notify stakeholders
Fast track subsequent activities to make up time
Request an extension of the project deadline

questions.question: A project manager is reviewing the project's earned value metrics and discovers the following: BAC = $100,000, PV = $50,000, EV = $40,000, AC = $55,000. What is the project's cost performance index (CPI)?
During a project status meeting, a team member reports that a risk identified earlier in the project has occurred. Which of the following should the project manager do NEXT?
options: Update the risk register
Implement the contingency plan
Perform a new risk assessment
Close the risk item

questions.question: A project manager notices that team members are frequently missing important information because they receive too many emails. Which of the following would be the MOST effective solution?
options: Send more detailed emails with clearer subject lines
Implement a communication management plan with defined channels for different types of information
Hold more frequent team meetings to verbally communicate all information
Reduce the number of people copied on emails

questions.question: A project team is experiencing conflict related to technical decisions. Team members from different departments disagree on the approach to use. What leadership style would be MOST effective in this situation?
options: Autocratic - make the decision quickly and move on
Laissez-faire - let the team work it out themselves
Participative - facilitate discussion to reach consensus
Servant - focus on individual team member needs

questions.question: A project has been completed and the deliverables have been accepted by the client. What should the project manager do NEXT?
options: Reassign team members to new projects
Document lessons learned
Close project accounts and contracts
Archive project documents

questions.question: A project manager needs to purchase specialized equipment for a project. The requirements are well-defined, but there are several potential vendors. Which procurement document should be used?
options: Request for Proposal (RFP)
Request for Information (RFI)
Request for Quotation (RFQ)
Statement of Work (SOW)

questions.question: A project team is implementing a new software system and wants to ensure that it meets user requirements. Which quality tool would be MOST helpful in verifying that all requirements have been addressed?
options: Pareto chart
Control chart
Cause and effect diagram
Requirements traceability matrix

questions.question: A project manager is developing the risk management plan for a complex IT implementation project. Which of the following would be the MOST appropriate tool to prioritize identified risks?
options: SWOT analysis
Probability and impact matrix
Decision tree analysis
Brainstorming

questions.question: A key stakeholder with high power and influence is showing little interest in a critical project. Which approach would be MOST effective for managing this stakeholder?
options: Ignore them since they show little interest
Send them all project communications
Keep them satisfied with regular, targeted updates
Engage them closely and manage their expectations actively

questions.question: A project manager is dealing with multiple change requests that impact different aspects of the project. What is the BEST approach to handle these changes?
options: Implement all changes immediately to avoid delays
Reject all changes to maintain the baseline
Process each change through the integrated change control system
Delegate change decisions to team leads

questions.question: During a project review, a client requests features that were not part of the original requirements. The project is currently on schedule and within budget. What should the project manager do?
options: Add the features without formal documentation
Refuse the request to maintain the baseline
Implement the change control process and assess impacts
Add the features and adjust the schedule without documentation

questions.question: A project manager notices that a team member with critical skills is overallocated across multiple projects. Which of the following would be the MOST appropriate solution?
options: Request additional resources with similar skills
Negotiate with other project managers for the resource's time
Ask the team member to work overtime
Revise the project schedule to accommodate the resource's availability

questions.question: A project is halfway through its schedule but has spent 70% of its budget. The project manager calculates that the Cost Performance Index (CPI) is 0.85. What does this indicate about the project?
options: The project is under budget
The project is over budget
The project will be completed early
The project is ahead of schedule

questions.question: A project manager is developing a project schedule and needs to identify which activities can be delayed without affecting the project end date. Which technique should be used?
options: Resource leveling
Critical path analysis
Float calculation
Schedule compression
